00035 #ifndef __SCA_RANDOMNUMBERGENERATOR_H__
00036 #define __SCA_RANDOMNUMBERGENERATOR_H__
00037 
00038 #ifdef WITH_CXX_GUARDEDALLOC
00039 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 class SCA_RandomNumberGenerator {
00043 
00044     /* reference counted for memleak */
00045     int m_refcount;
00046 
00048     long m_seed;
00049 
00050     /* A bit silly.. The N parameter is a define in the .cpp file */
00052     /* unsigned long mt[N]; */
00053     unsigned long mt[624];
00054 
00056     int mti; /* initialized in the cpp file */
00057 
00059     void SetStartVector(void);
00060  public:
00061     SCA_RandomNumberGenerator(long seed);
00062     ~SCA_RandomNumberGenerator();
00063     unsigned long Draw();
00064     float DrawFloat();
00065     long GetSeed();
00066     void SetSeed(long newseed);
00067     SCA_RandomNumberGenerator* AddRef()
00068     {
00069         ++m_refcount;
00070         return this;
00071     }
00072     void Release()
00073     {
00074         if (--m_refcount == 0)
00075             delete this;
00076     }
00077     
00078     
00079 #ifdef WITH_CXX_GUARDEDALLOC
00080 public:
00081     void *operator new(size_t num_bytes) { return MEM_mallocN(num_bytes, "GE:SCA_RandomNumberGenerator"); }
00082     void operator delete( void *mem ) { MEM_freeN(mem); }
00083 #endif
00084 };
